metadata.name: whirlpool
metadata.description: Orca Whirlpool - Concentrated liquidity market maker with position NFTs and capital efficiency

errors.name: InvalidEnum
errors.msg: Enum value could not be converted

errors.name: TickArrayExistInPool
errors.msg: Tick-array already exists in this whirlpool

errors.name: TickArrayIndexOutofBounds
errors.msg: Attempt to search for a tick-array failed

errors.name: ClosePositionNotEmpty
errors.msg: Position is not empty It cannot be closed

errors.name: NumberCastError
errors.msg: Unable to cast number into BigInt

errors.name: TickNotFound
errors.msg: Tick not found within tick array

errors.name: InvalidTickIndex
errors.msg: Provided tick index is either out of bounds or uninitializable

errors.name: SqrtPriceOutOfBounds
errors.msg: Provided sqrt price out of bounds

errors.name: LiquidityZero
errors.msg: Liquidity amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: LiquidityTooHigh
errors.msg: Liquidity amount must be less than i64::MAX

errors.name: LiquidityNetError
errors.msg: Tick liquidity net underflowed or overflowed

errors.name: MissingOrInvalidDelegate
errors.msg: Position token account has a missing or invalid delegate

errors.name: InvalidTimestampConversion
errors.msg: Timestamp should be convertible from i64 to u64

errors.name: InvalidTimestamp
errors.msg: Timestamp should be greater than the last updated timestamp

errors.name: InvalidTickArraySequence
errors.msg: Invalid tick array sequence provided for instruction.

errors.name: RewardVaultAmountInsufficient
errors.msg: Reward vault requires amount to support emissions for at least one day

errors.name: InvalidSqrtPriceLimitDirection
errors.msg: Provided SqrtPriceLimit not in the same direction as the swap.

errors.name: ZeroTradableAmount
errors.msg: There are no tradable amount to swap.

errors.name: TickArraySequenceInvalidIndex
errors.msg: Invalid index for tick array sequence

errors.name: InvalidBundleIndex
errors.msg: Bundle index is out of bounds

errors.name: PositionBundleNotDeletable
errors.msg: Unable to delete PositionBundle with open positions

errors.name: NoExtraAccountsForTransferHook
errors.msg: Unable to call transfer hook without extra accounts

errors.name: RemainingAccountsDuplicatedAccountsType
errors.msg: Same accounts type is provided more than once

errors.name: TooManySupplementalTickArrays
errors.msg: Too many supplemental tick arrays provided

errors.name: DifferentWhirlpoolTickArrayAccount
errors.msg: TickArray account for different whirlpool provided
